scripts.publish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-force/build/d3-force.js d3-force.v1.js && cp ../d3-force/build/d3-force.min.js d3-force.v1.min.js && git add d3-force.v1.js d3-force.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-force ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-force.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-force.js build/d3-force.min.js
